column2: SSH agent support for git and svn integrations

column3: This version allows SSH agent-based authentication to be used for authenticating to SVN or git, as discussed in the ticket http://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-52034

@klikh, by the way, a word as to timeline -- it's possible I may only be available to support this patch for another month or two; mid-April on the outside. It'd probably be good to have it merged well within that period.

@charles-dyfis-net
We'll try to review, test & merge is ASAP after new year holidays.

@charles-dyfis-net
The issue with conflicting trilead libraries from different plugins is currently kind of known limitation when running IDEA from IDEA - in such configuration, dependencies are not "scoped" by plugin and so there could be conflicts. Such issues do not occur in "public" builds.
So not to fix this issue locally only for trilead library (using packages rename) we propose the following:
Thanks a lot! Feel free to ask in case of any questions.
